alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton; Izard (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 3:26PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Izard, Fulton and northeastern Baxter Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bakersfield to near Bexar to near Wideman. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salem in Fulton County... Horseshoe Bend... Calico Rock... Oxford... Viola... Pineville... Bexar... Flint Springs... Ott... Sturkie... Wideman... Byron... Heart... Moko... Union... Salem Airport... Mitchell... Wild Cherry... Gepp... Morriston... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
